greeting:
Hi! My name is Jhonatan and 
I’m a Full-Stack 
Developer
text-about: I am a passionate Full-Stack Developer with experience in building web applications using modern technologies. I enjoy solving complex problems and creating efficient solutions that enhance user experiences.
lamborghini: It’s been a while since I worked on that project. It was a recreation inspired by one of my favorite car brands. At the time, I learned a lot of new things, but looking back, I know I could do it much better today.
petlove: This was an academic project that I worked on with my teacher and classmates. It was our first introduction to React, and we built a blog about PetCare, which includes tips on how to take care of your pet.
